}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "AW-NU222 V0A" appears to be silkscreened on the board of production units.
This module was used with some '''[[Medion]]''' desktops. :It is '''[[Medion]]''' P/N 20036425.
Devices probably using the module include... *[http://www.medion.com/gb/service/start/_product.php?msn=10011318 MEDION AKOYA MD 8828]
